title: Preserve Listed Phrases As-Is
context:
Condition : when a phrase is in below list
Action : use as is
acquirer : acquirer
issuer : issuer
clearing : clearing
Authorization : Authorization
alphanumeric : alphanumeric
online : online
processors : processors
product code : product code
wallet ID : wallet ID
DE : DE
Subfield : SF
Subelement : SE
Data Element : Data Element
Data Integrity : Data Integrity
token : token
Primary Account Number : Primary Account Number
Dual Message System : Dual Mesaj Sistemi
Single Message System : Single Mesaj Sistemi
Trace ID : Trace ID
core : core
initiatives : initiatives
network : network
reversal : reversal
Central Time : Central Time
switch : switch
release : release
freeze : freeze
peak : peak
script : script
flag : flag
windows : windows
dispute : dispute
endpoint : endpoint
vendor : vendor
foils : foils
sheets : sheets
emboss : emboss
hologram : hologram
workshop : workshop
workstream : workstream
onboarding : onboarding
sheet : sheet
stand-in : stand-in
acceptor : acceptor
level : level
interchange rate designator (IRD) : interchange rate designator (IRD)
dataset : dataset
field : field
quasi-cash : quasi-cash
bypass : bypass
opt-in : opt-in
Tier : Tier
deployment : deployment

title: Phrase Translation And Replacement Rule For Turkish Equivalents
context:
Condition : when a phrase is in below list
Action : use correspondant in the list that states original with  Turkish meaning in parantheses
merchant : merchant (işyeri)
mandate : mandate (zorunluluk)
refund : refund (iade)
interchange : interchange (takas)
prepaid : prepaid (ön ödemeli)
debit : debit (banka kartı)
credit : credit (kredi)
compliance : compliance (uyumluluk)
cardholder : cardholder (kart sahibi)
threshold : threshold (eşik)
validations : validations (doğrulamalar)
decline : decline (red)
small and middle enterprises (SME) : küçük ve orta ölçekli işletmeler/small and middle enterprises (SME)
account manager/account representative : account temsilcisi
withdrawal transactions : Para çekme (withdrawal) işlemleri
near-real time : near-real time (neredeyse gerçek zamanlı)
CNP/card-not-present : kart-sahibi olmadan (CNP - card-not-present)
Key Performance Indicators/KPIs : Temel performans göstergeleri (Key Performance Indicators - KPIs)
consumer : consumer (tüketici)
commercial : commercial (ticari)
maintenance : maintenance (bakım)
